query: SELECT state, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_2 WHERE summary LIKE '%Los Angeles Clippers%' GROUP BY state HAVING SUM(attendance) > 15000
SELECT stadium, COUNT(game_id) FROM sportset_2 WHERE summary LIKE '%Miami Heat%' GROUP BY stadium ORDER BY COUNT(game_id) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT city, AVG(attendance) FROM sportset_2 WHERE summary LIKE '%Oklahoma City Thunder%' GROUP BY city HAVING AVG(attendance) < 20000
SELECT month, SUM(capacity) FROM sportset_2 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Center%' GROUP BY month HAVING SUM(capacity) > 50000
SELECT dayname, COUNT(DISTINCT game_id) FROM sportset_2 WHERE summary LIKE '%Anthony Davis%' AND stadium LIKE '%Arena%' GROUP BY dayname ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT game_id) DESC
SELECT state, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE summary LIKE '%Washington Wizards%' GROUP BY state HAVING SUM(attendance) > 10000
SELECT stadium, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Arena%' GROUP BY stadium ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT month, AVG(attendance) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE summary LIKE '%Charlotte Hornets%' GROUP BY month HAVING AVG(attendance) > 15000
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE summary LIKE '%Jazz%' OR summary LIKE '%Hornets%'
SELECT dayname, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_coldtemp_30_13 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Center%' AND month = 'April' GROUP BY dayname HAVING SUM(attendance) > 20000
SELECT state, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_midwest_30_8 WHERE summary LIKE '%Los Angeles Lakers%' GROUP BY state HAVING SUM(attendance) > 15000
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_midwest_30_8 WHERE summary LIKE '%Indiana Pacers%' AND month = 'February' GROUP BY city
SELECT stadium, MAX(capacity) FROM sportset_midwest_30_8 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Fieldhouse%'
SELECT state, AVG(attendance) FROM sportset_midwest_30_8 WHERE summary LIKE '%Trail Blazers%' GROUP BY state HAVING AVG(attendance) > 15000
SELECT DISTINCT dayname FROM sportset_midwest_30_8 WHERE summary LIKE '%Rockets%' ORDER BY dayname ASC
SELECT city, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_northeast_30_1 WHERE summary LIKE '%Brooklyn Nets%' GROUP BY city HAVING SUM(attendance) > 15000
SELECT state, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_northeast_30_1 WHERE summary LIKE '%Philadelphia 76ers%' AND month = 'March' GROUP BY state
SELECT stadium, MAX(capacity) FROM sportset_northeast_30_1 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Center%'
SELECT dayname, AVG(attendance) FROM sportset_northeast_30_1 WHERE summary LIKE '%Cavaliers%' GROUP BY dayname ORDER BY AVG(attendance) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sportset_northeast_30_1 WHERE summary LIKE '%Los Angeles Lakers%' AND year = 2018
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_west_30_4 WHERE summary LIKE '%Denver Nuggets%' GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT stadium, SUM(attendance) FROM sportset_west_30_4 WHERE summary LIKE '%Utah Jazz%' GROUP BY stadium HAVING SUM(attendance) > 30000
SELECT state, AVG(capacity) FROM sportset_west_30_4 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Arena%' GROUP BY state ORDER BY AVG(capacity) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT game_id, MAX(attendance) FROM sportset_west_30_4 WHERE summary LIKE '%Golden State Warriors%' GROUP BY game_id
SELECT month, COUNT(DISTINCT game_id) FROM sportset_west_30_4 WHERE summary LIKE '%Houston Rockets%' AND year = 2018 GROUP BY month ORDER BY month ASC
